// Minimal API service using fetch and the existing frontend proxy
const handleResponse=async res=>{const contentType=res.headers.get('content-type')||'';if(!res.ok){const text=await res.text();throw new Error(text||"HTTP ".concat(res.status));}if(contentType.includes('application/json'))return res.json();if(contentType.includes('application/pdf')||contentType.includes('application/octet-stream'))return res.blob();return res.text();};export const getSimulations=()=>fetch('/api/simulations').then(handleResponse);export const getRandomSimulation=()=>fetch('/api/simulate_attack').then(handleResponse);export const submitSimulation=payload=>fetch('/api/submit_interaction',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(payload)}).then(handleResponse);export const coachAdvice=payload=>fetch('/api/coach',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(payload)}).then(handleResponse);export const getBehaviorAnalytics=()=>fetch('/api/analytics/behavior').then(handleResponse);export const requestCertificate=payload=>fetch('/api/certificate',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(payload)}).then(handleResponse);export default{getSimulations,getRandomSimulation,submitSimulation,coachAdvice,getBehaviorAnalytics,requestCertificate};
